scripts.start: npm run showcase && cd ../extended-pdf-viewer && ng s -o
scripts.unix-package: ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rm -r dist && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json
scripts.showcase: npm run unix-package && rm -r ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cp -R dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
scripts.issue: npm run unix-package && rm -r ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer-issues/issue609/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cp -R dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer-issues/issue609/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
scripts.win-package: ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rmdir dist /S && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json
scripts.release: npm run unix-package && cd dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm publish && cd .. && cd .. && ./createTag.sh && node ./increase-version-number.js
